title: Some reasons why Robert Bridgman, and his wife, and some others in Hvntington-shire, have left the society of the people called Quakers, and have join'd in communion with the Church of England and some passages contained in a letter of George Whitehead to R.J., and R. Bridgman's reply to the same / by Robert Bridgman.
author: Bridgman, Robert.
publisher: Printed for Brab. Aylmer ..., and Char. Brome ...,
